casebody.data:
RICH et al. v. SARGENT GRANITE CO. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by Percy Rich and others against the Sargent Granite Company. .

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and FOLLETT and PARKER, JJ.

No opinion. Order affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements.
